channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Stephen J. Binz explores a holy icon of a specific moment in Church history and what it means for our times. Hosted by Johnnette Williams, part 5 of 5. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Where God Weeps
channel.desc: Mark Riedemann interviews his Excellency Christian Carlassare MCCJ, bishop of Rumbek, South Sudan regarding the dire need for humanitarian assistance and protection in South Sudan. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Stones And Pearls: The Rosary In The Holy Land
channel.desc: In the Garden of Gethsemane, Jesus offers his human will to the Father, allowing God?s divine will to be done in his suffering and death. The first sorrowful mystery likens Jesus? drops of blood to rubies in the moonlight. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: John Paul Ii: Be Not Afraid
channel.desc: An animated biography on the early life of St. John Paul II up to his election as Pope. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Massterpiece Donut Shop
channel.desc: Meet the Donut Man, Fr. Joe, and the kids who work in the Massterpiece Donut Shop as they discover the amazing Massterpiece Machine that helps them learn all about the Mass. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother Angelica lends her wisdom on a variety of topics, including the Temple of the Holy Spirit. (60 minutes).
